channel.title: Can't get into Shop CFGs i need to now the progam i need to open them
channel.description: :( I realy wana now what program i need to buy, download to open the shop, item CFG files. If you now were i can download one ( even thoe I doubt you can ) plz give meh the link thank you.

item.title: Can't get into Shop CFGs i need to now the progam i need to open them
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

There’s no compiling involved. You just right-click on shops.cfg, click ‘open with…’ choose the program ‘Notepad’.

Simple As That  :)

Read full topic
